elevator.rmi.impl
Class GetAllImpl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
        |
        +--java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
              |
              +--java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
                    |
                    +--elevator.rmi.impl.GetAllImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GetAll, java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
public class GetAllImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements GetAll

The class implements the GetAll remote interface that provides references to components of elevators to be controlled via RMI. An object of the class creates servants with specific interfaces and provides servants' references to the requesting clients via GetAll remote interface. The policy is to create only one instance of each servant (motor, door, etc.) like in real hardware.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Vlad Vlassov, IMIT/KTH, Stockholm, Sweden
See Also:
GetAll, Serialized Form
